synopsis.text: Maine's gang member, Sasha, navigates the futuristic landscape of Cyberpunk 2077 in the music video for Dawid Podsiad≈Ço's haunting melody, Let You Down. Directed by the visionary Ilya Kuvshinov, this captivating visual journey doubles as the perfect ending theme for the anime series Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, immersing viewers in a world where technology and humanity collide.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
